duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot issues related to injection molding processes and associated equipment.
Document and communicate problem-solving results to colleagues and supervisors.
Maintain documentation for process equipment and manage process controls for injection molding.
Monitor equipment maintenance and mold change program loading.
Assist in training associates for line operation and process controls.
Supervise the injection molding process to ensure proper controls.
Schedule routine and preventative maintenance of equipment.
Analyze operations for possible improvements and recommend such improvements to the Manufacturing Engineer.
Run all Design of Experiments (DOEs) and launch samples.
Perform other duties as assigned by manager/supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or Equivalent with an emphasis on mathematics, and mechanical or similar. Equivalent work experience may also be considered.
